name: Ragged child
message: No... not again, it happened again

name: Option
message: That was wild... he actually killed that man

name: Traveler
message: Kid... that... is not your fault

name: Ragged child
message: Of course it is! I just kill him... I'm a murderer

name: Traveler
message: He was going to hurt you or maybe kill you, I can tell

name: Ragged child
message: I hate this city... I hate what I became

name: Traveler
message: It's my fault, I should have done something, instead you acted

name: Ragged child
message: He would have killed you...

name: Ragged child
message: I just... want this madness to be over

name: Ragged child
message: Why did I have to be born poor? People with money can do what they want

name: Ragged child
message: But me? I have to beg, do dirty jobs and steel to just even get something to eat

name: Option
message: He seems so helpless, I feel sorry for him

name: Traveler
message: You killed a man... you actually did it, what have you done?

name: Traveler
message: You are a murderer now, you know it right?

name: Ragged child
message: I always have been...

name: Traveler
message: You should go away, otherwise more guards will come for you

name: Ragged child
message: There's no place to go away, hidding it's the only option for people like me

name: Traveler
message: I'm sorry... I really feel sorry for your situation

name: Ragged child
message: Maybe... but that doesn't help me, only a miracle can help me now

name: Traveler
message: You can take some of my money, it could help you...

name: Ragged child
message: Thank you... I will, maybe I could survive a little longer

name: Option
message: He killed a man... despite this... I feel bad for him.

name: Traveler
message: It's okay... everything will be fine

name: Ragged child
message: Here's your money... You will need it if you're going to stay in Valdir

name: Traveler
message: Kid...
